title: International Baccalaureate
description: Developed critical thinking, adaptability, and research skills.
details: Honed my ability to learn independently, adapt to complex challenges, and engage in rigorous research; a strong foundation for my future studies.

title: University of Alberta - CS Honours
description: Pursued a BSc. with Honours in Computing Science.
details: Specialized in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering. Graduated with First Class Honors and received multiple scholarships.

title: Arts For YoungSTARS
details: Led the executive board, managed budgets, organized events, and handled logistics for fundraising and safety.

title: Aquatic Biosphere Project
details: Defined product requirements, prioritized features, designed educational games, and developed an organism identification system using OpenCV.
